intro: Escape or capture in this cute and chaotic 4v2 action party game! Play as mischievous animal prisoners using peepee, poopie, and special skills to escape.
description:
About This Game
Unleash the mayhem in Pritto Prisoner, the cute and chaotic 4v2 asymmetrical party game where animal inmates lay poopie traps, spray peepee, and use special skills to outwit robot guards. 

Inside a notorious island prison, the world’s cutest criminals, including a gangster rabbit, an influencer cat, and even a penguin chef, are locked in maximum security under 24/7 robot surveillance. 

Will you scramble to freedom as a poopie-dropping prisoner, or hunt them down as a custom-built robot warden? Choose your side and jump into unpredictable escapes, chaotic chases, and laugh-out-loud clashes where no two matches ever play out the same!

ANIMAL TEAM

・Complete funny and unique objectives around the prison to open the escape gates.
・Eat bread and drink water to fuel your potty powers: poopie and peepee.
・Poopie: dropping your load in toilets powers you up and brings you one step closer to freedom！
・Peepee: unleash your bladder on robots and cameras to short-circuit them, giving your team a chance to escape.
・Whether you’re slicing through robots as a lion sword master or dropping explosive decoy art as an elephant fraudster, every animal packs unique skills and passives that unlock outrageous new playstyles!
・Captured animals go to the Nap Room, where counting sheep can bring them back. Get tucked in too many times and it’s Deep Sleep for good!

ROBOT TEAM

・Build your robot from mix-and-match parts, combining upper and lower bodies with gadgets and boosts that let you capture in your own way.
・Uppers: shape your offense with weapons like the Stun Gun for shocking captures or the Lasso for long-range takedowns.
・Lowers: change the way you move with options like legs, wheels, or tank treads to chase down escapees.
・Equip gadgets and boosts like the Magic Hand to trap animals, the Wormhole to slip through walls, the Motion Sensor to track their moves, and the Shield to block enemy peepee.
・Collect poopie left behind during the match to unlock stronger upgrades and supercharge your robot.
・Coordinate with your robot partner to turn every escape attempt into a chaotic back-and-forth of counters, traps, and mayhem.

KEY FEATURES

・Asymmetrical 4v2 multiplayer with animals on the run and robots on the hunt
・Quick 10-minute matches perfect for party play
・A hilarious yet strategic peepee-and-poopie gameplay loop
・Kanahei’s adorable art style and TeddyLoid’s energetic soundtrack
・Cross-platform play
・Single-player campaign to uncover the secrets of Prison Island
・Complete Pritto Challenges to earn Pritto Coins and unlock decorations
・Customize your animals and robots with a variety of fun decorations
・Host private matches with your friends using custom settings
